description.value:
Armor (Medium or Heavy), Rare
This glossy black armor is made from enchanted carrion beetle chitin by the darakhul. If the armor normally imposes disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks or has a Strength requirement, the ebony beetle version of the armor doesnâ€™t. While wearing the armor, you are immune to slashing damage. It is half the weight of comparable metal armor.
